container.heading: State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Comprehensive Care Facility (Nursing Home) Services

section.heading: Incorporation by Reference.
section.text: The State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Comprehensive Care Facility (Nursing Home) Services is incorporated by reference.

annotations.annotation: Health-General Article, §§19-103, 19-109(a)(1), 19-114, 19-118, 19-120, 19-120.2, 19-123, and 19-124, Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulation .01 repealed and new Regulation .01 adopted effective February 17, 2025 (52:3 Md. R. 160)
